mapper.select: select SEQ_PFS,PSEQ_PFS,B_TYPE,SI,GU,DONG,BUNJI,H_NUMBER,CONTRACT_TYPE,BUDGET1,BUDGET2,BUDGET3,BUDGET4,BUDGET5,BUDGET6,M_COST,LOAN,AREA1,AREA2,AREA3,MOVE_SCHEDULE, END_OFLEASE,ROOM,BATHROOM,DIRECTION,HEATING_SYSTEM,NUMBER_OF_HOUSEHOLD,PARKING,FLOOR,FLOOR_TOTAL,B_YEAR,CONTEXT from property_for_sale where pseq_pfs = (select seq_u from user where id = #{ID})
